question_id: Tampilkan rata-rata durasi film untuk setiap kategori film.
sql_query:
SELECT
    c.category_name,
    AVG(f.length) AS rata_rata_durasi
FROM
    film f
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category c ON fc.category_id = c.category_id
GROUP BY
    c.category_name
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
    c.category_name,
    AVG(f.length) AS rata_rata_durasi
FROM
    film f
JOIN
    film_category fc ON f.film_id = fc.film_id
JOIN
    category c ON fc.category_id = c.category_id
GROUP BY
    c.category_name;
```
